cab.content: THIS DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OF HER BRITANNIC MAJESTVS GOVERNMENTThe circulation of this paper has been strictly limited.It is issued for the personal use of top SECRET Copy NoC.(57) 31 8th January, 1957CABINETSITUATION IN EGYPTNote by the Secretary of Statefor Foreign affairs would like to draw the attention of my colleagues to theattached memorandum on the internal situation in Egypt which has beenprepared by the Joint Intelligence Committee. A similar appreciation willbe produced at weekly intervals until further notice and will be circulateddirect to members of the Cabinet by the Secretary of the J.I.C.S.JL.Foreign Office, S.W.1.17th January, 1957 The circulation of this paper has been strictly limited.It is issued for the personal use of................................................................TOP SECRET cepy Mo.J^Gj^ti 12/217til January. 195.7CHIEFS OF STAFF COMMITTEEJOINT INTELLIGENCE COMMITTEESITUATION IN EGYPT AS AT 1.5TH JANUARY. 1957Note "by the secretary the attached memorandum prepared on the instructions ofthe Joint Intelligence Committee, and endorsed by them at their meeting"'' today, is circulated for information.(Signed) J.G.
